feed.title: OctoBot: Free open source trading robot
feed.subtitle: OctoBot is an open source cryptocurrency trading robot designed to be easy to use and infinitely customizable.

entry.title: Trading using ChatGPT
entry.content: Wouldn’t it be great to know what ChatGPT thinks about a particular market direction ? Trading now using ChatGPT predictions.
entry.summary: Wouldn’t it be great to know what ChatGPT thinks about a particular market direction ? Trading now using ChatGPT predictions.

entry.title: The Strategy Designer
entry.content: Discover the new Strategy Desginer, where you will find many tools to experiment, analyse, compare and optimize your strategies and their configurations to their full potential.
entry.summary: Discover the new Strategy Desginer, where you will find many tools to experiment, analyse, compare and optimize your strategies and their configurations to their full potential.

entry.title: Cloud OctoBot plans
entry.content:
In the OctoBot team, we want everyone to be able to use OctoBot and enjoy great trading strategies.
That’s why we created 4 different plans that are designed to fit every user.
entry.summary: In the OctoBot team, we want everyone to be able to use OctoBot and enjoy great trading strategies. That’s why we created 4 different plans that are designed to fit every user.
